There is a provision in the tax reform plan the Senate is considering that would tax employees on stock options or RSUs at the time of vesting, regardless of whether or not there had been a liquidity event.
The consequences of taxing of options at time of vesting to innovation in the United States would be truly devastating. Draining cash out of unprofitable startups will just cause them to leave.
Call/email your Congressperson and demand this is struck down.

summary: Protect Your Family Online.  Clean Router automatically blocks pornography and illicit content on every device in your home with one simple solution.Easy to manage | No software installation | Works with every device type www.CleanRouter.com Recently, we’ve begun using the Clean Router at our church. Now, every access point in the church, both wired and wireless, can only access filtered Internet.- Youth Pastor Wick, Father of 3Clean Router differs from most parental control solutions in that it’s a hardware device, not software. It can definitely do some things that are tough for the typical software-based utility. Clean Router can manage and monitor Internet traffic for every connected device. Of course, content filtering at the router level is browser-independent. In fact, it’s totally device-independent.—PC MagazineWe work with families, churches and businesses all around the world to protect families from the dangers of the Internet.  With new devices, game consoles, smart TVs and others, there has never been more access to pornography and other content that today.  Software solutions can’t cover all these areas, which is why we created Clean Router.Control screen time.  See email reports of Internet activity by device.  Have peace of mind about what your kids and guests can access. --------------------------------OpenDNS, SafeEyes, CovenantEyes, K-9, Net Nanny, XXX Church, Fight the New Drug, Porn Harms, Home Internet Filtering, Block Pornography
